line_1: To gayer scenes I fain would me betake?
line_2: Harmless at least, tho' now a sigh would break.

line_1: To shady bow'rs forthwith themselves betake,
line_2: In sudden laughter forth at once they break,

line_1: To shady bow'rs forthwith themselves betake,
line_2: Deep hid in myrtle groves, beside a silver lake.
